bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a hot and sluggish body with heavy perspiration, an aversion to wind and short breath, brought forth by excessive consumption of alcoholic beverages. Su wen 素問 46: 有病身熱解惰，汗出如浴，惡風少氣，此為何病？岐伯曰：病名曰酒 風 , “Someone suffers from [the following]: his body is hot and sluggish. Sweatleaves [his body] as if he had taken a bath. He has an aversion to wind and is short of qi. Which disease is that? Qi Bo: The disease is called wine wind ”.
